title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification
description: Description: The label's font size doesn't change immediately after it is modified.
OB: Observed Behavior: The label's height remains the same even after modifying the font size.
EB: Expected Behavior: The label's height should adjust automatically to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the interface. 
2. Modify the font size of the label to '18 points'.
